page.title: 15Ravenstock Farm (II)
page.content: In their spare time they like to play sports of various kinds like tennis, golf, swimming and windsurfing. They have quite a few machines, such as a combine harvester, a drill and a grain spreader. The combine harvester is used for cutting the corn and it has a spout on the side through which the grain is loaded into the lorry that comes by the side of the machine. The combine harvester that belongs to that farm is the latest kind and has a very complicated dashboard. The drill is used for keeping the seeds in rows when they are being sown. A harvest can fill a barn up to twelve feet deep and a person can walk along the top and tell by the feel of the grain underfoot how dry it is. But that isn't a very safe thing to do.
